attributes.additional_details:
Change the signs of the Zodiac to the names of Christ's disciples w/t/e of Judas being swopped with Jesus.
Thus,
Peter = Aries          Phillip = Libra
Andrew = Taurus    Bartholomew =Scorpio
James = Gemini     James = Sagittarius
John = Cancer        Thaddaes = Capricorn
Matthew = Leo        Simon = Aquarius
Thomas = Virgo      Jesus = Pisces
This would be strictly enforced across all media/publishing outlets bringing together New Age Pagans and Christians together in spiritual harmony and inspiring one thousand years of peace.
